text: “Ndithu amene akhulupirira, ndi amene ali m’chipembedzo cha Chiyuda, ndi chipembedzo cha Sabia; ndi Akhrisitu, ndi Maajusi (opembedza moto), ndi ophatikiza Allah ndi mafano, ndithu Allah adzaweruza pakati pawo tsiku la chiweruziro (Qiyâma). (Osokera adzaponyedwa ku Moto ndipo olungama adzawalowetsa ku Munda wamtendere). Ndithu Allah ndi Mboni pa chinthu chilichonse
